attributes.action: Increase NHS wages to 3% not the shocking 1% that has been offered
attributes.additional_details: NHS staff have worked so hard what would we have done without there dedication and humanity they have earned more than we can ever pay them. 1% is an insult and a kick in the teeth

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

Support NHS staff with a pay rise this year of 3% or more
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578071
